name: The Alenieverse
description:
My second ever unity game created in about 1.5 months as a birthday present for a friend. Some models swapped for release from initial birthday version.

Controls

  • WASD - Movement
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Space - Jump 
  • ESC - Menu
  • Left click - Shoot
  • Right click - Aim
  • R - Reload
  • 1/2/3 - Switch Weapons
  • E- interact
  • F/Tab - Flashlight
